TopicTitle: mods to make cash / funds and emulate space exploitation

Articles.Content:
so.. we got funds now which is great.

I enjoy ksp again. sandbox has a meaning.

since funds are never really a problem (even sticking to vanilla and contracts) I usually set my sights on getting as rich as possible and emulating

an industrial space / exploration corporation.

what mods are there to help me harvest the richness of space and gives the possibilities to earn funds ?

looking forward for your help / input and guidance

regards
When kethane gets updated, I suspect that it will be a rather lucrative business to truck it back to Kerbin and recover it.
